section:
You stand against the wall as the high priestess draws back her arm, and hurls a stream of daggers at you. .
If the total is higher than your Defence, a dagger hits you and you lose 1-6 Stamina points (roll a die to see how many).
If the two dice score less than or equal to your Defence, the daggers all miss.
Either way, if you survive then you are free to leave. Delete Lacuna from the God box on your Adventure Sheet and .
